properties.entry: SELECT MOVIE_NO, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM TB_ATTACHMENT WHERE FILE_LEVEL = 3 ORDER BY MOVIE_NO

SELECT MOVIE_NO, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM TB_ATTACHMENT JOIN (SELECT MOVIE_NO, NVL(COUNT(SEAT.SEAT_NO),'0') RANK FROM TB_SCREEN SCREEN LEFT JOIN TB_SEAT SEAT ON(SEAT.SCREEN_NO = SCREEN.SCREEN_NO) GROUP BY MOVIE_NO ORDER BY RANK DESC) USING(MOVIE_NO) WHERE FILE_LEVEL = 1
SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE,'YYYY.MM.DD') AS CREATE_DATE FROM TB_NOTICE ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC
